channel.title: Announcements on Battle of Brothers
channel.description: Recent content in Announcements on Battle of Brothers

item.title: Come One, Come All
item.description: Welcome … to Medieval Times! Ahh, I wish I was eating there right now. Wrong place though. You’re at my blog for the Battle of Brothers game development duel. My brother, Chris, and I will take a year and $25,000 to see who can make the most profitable game.

item.title: Welcome to the Site!
item.description: Hi there, I’m Chris and welcome to my game development blog. In case you came directly to this site and not through the splash page, let me give you a quick intro as to what’s going on.
